intent_atoms.description: Implement Sample Encryption Placeholder Parsing to verify encryption metadata end-to-end via regression fixtures and documentation updates.
Enforce Parent Containment and Non-Overlap validation so child boxes cannot exceed parent ranges and overlapping payloads are flagged in CLI/UI surfaces.
Regression fixtures for sample-encryption-placeholder must pass ParsePipeline/CLI/App coverage tests.
Structural validation must flag overlapping payloads for CLI/UI surfaces.
Child boxes cannot exceed parent ranges.
Use ParsePipeline integration tests and CLI/JSON coverage to surface VR-018 codec diagnostics end-to-end.

functional_units.name: Sample Encryption Placeholder Parsing
functional_units.description: Parses encryption metadata from sample-encryption-placeholder regression fixtures and verifies end-to-end coverage via ParsePipeline, CLI, and App.

functional_units.name: Enforce Parent Containment and Non-Overlap Validation
functional_units.description: Validates that child boxes are within parent ranges and flags overlapping payloads for CLI/UI surfaces.

functional_units.name: Codec Validation Coverage Expansion
functional_units.description: Expands ParsePipeline integration tests and adds CLI/JSON coverage to surface VR‑018 codec diagnostics end-to-end.
